de.dfki.lt.mary.htsengine
Class SlideVector

java.lang.Object
  de.dfki.lt.mary.htsengine.SlideVector

public class SlideVector
extends java.lang.Object

Slide Vector is a Vector that can be used with different offsets. Java port and extension of HTS engine version 2.0 Extension: mixed excitation

Author:
Christoph Endres, Marcela charfuelan.
